name: Gear Collector
description:
Made during the WOWIE Jam 4.0.

I recommend to download the game if the WebGL version lags.

Use the right and left mouse butoon to create ways for your partner and help him collect all golden gears in the level. Use Space to stop his movements.

Controls:

Mouse Position: Block Position

Left Mouse Button: Horizontal Box

Right Mouse Button: Vertical Box

Space: Stop Movement

R: Reload Level

Esc: Go back to main menu

Tip: Stopping the movement won't change the velocity, but it makes it far easier to put blocks in the right place. You can also move in mid-air.

The Jupiter font is created by Isurus Labs and is in the public domain.
